OOPSRequest.OntologyContent:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE rdf:RDF [ <!ENTITY owl "http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" > <!ENTITY xsd "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" > <!ENTITY rdfs "http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" > <!ENTITY rdf "http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" > <!ENTITY icl2 "http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#" > ]>
<rdf:RDF xmlns="http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#" xml:base="http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl" xmlns:icl2="http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#"> <owl:Ontology rdf:about="http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl"> <rdfs:comment>Mining Minds Context Ontology</rdfs:comment> </owl:Ontology>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Object Properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#hasActivity -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&icl2;hasActivity"> <rdfs:comment>Property used to relate a high-level context to the activity</rdfs:comment> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#hasEmotion -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&icl2;hasEmotion"> <rdfs:comment>Property used to relate a high-level context to the emotion</rdfs:comment> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#hasLocation -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&icl2;hasLocation"> <rdfs:comment>Property used to relate a high-level context to the location</rdfs:comment> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#isContextOf -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&icl2;isContextOf"> <rdfs:comment>Property used to relate a context to the user it belongs.</rdfs:comment> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Data properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#hasEndTime -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="&icl2;hasEndTime"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="&owl;FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:comment>Property used to relate a context to the time in which it ends to be valid.</rdfs:comment> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#hasStartTime -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="&icl2;hasStartTime"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="&owl;FunctionalProperty"/> <rdfs:comment>Property used to relate a context to the time in which it starts to be valid.</rdfs:comment> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Classes // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Activity -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Activity"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;LowLevelContext"/> <rdfs:comment>Class to describe the activities</rdfs:comment> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Amusement -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Amusement"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;HighLevelContext"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Dancing"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Sitting"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Standing"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Walking"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasEmotion"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Happiness"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Mall"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Dancing"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Sitting"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Standing"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Walking"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasEmotion"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Happiness"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Mall"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Anger -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Anger"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Emotion"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Boredom -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Boredom"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Emotion"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#ClimbingStairs -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;ClimbingStairs"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Activity"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Commuting -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Commuting"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;HighLevelContext"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Sitting"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Standing"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Transport"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Sitting"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Standing"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Transport"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Context -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Context"> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;isContextOf"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;User"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasEndTime"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&xsd;dateTime"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasStartTime"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&xsd;dateTime"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;isContextOf"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;User"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="&icl2;User"/> <rdfs:comment>Class to describe context</rdfs:comment> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Cycling -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Cycling"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Activity"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Dancing -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Dancing"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Activity"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#DescendingStairs -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;DescendingStairs"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Activity"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Disgust -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Disgust"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Emotion"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Eating -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Eating"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Activity"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Emotion -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Emotion"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;LowLevelContext"/> <rdfs:comment>Class to describe the emotions</rdfs:comment> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Exercising -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Exercising"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;HighLevelContext"/> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Hiking"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Outdoors"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Hiking"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Outdoors"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Stretching"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Gym"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Home"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Office"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Outdoors"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Stretching"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Gym"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Home"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Office"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Outdoors"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;ClimbingStairs"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;DescendingStairs"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Gym"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Home"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Office"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;ClimbingStairs"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;DescendingStairs"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Gym"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Home"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Office"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Cycling"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Jumping"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Running"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Gym"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Outdoors"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Cycling"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Jumping"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Running"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Gym"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Outdoors"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasEmotion"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Happiness"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Neutral"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Fear -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Fear"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Emotion"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Gardening -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Gardening"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;HighLevelContext"/> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Standing"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Sweeping"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Walking"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Yard"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Standing"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Sweeping"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Walking"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasEmotion"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Happiness"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Neutral"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Yard"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Gym -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Gym"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Location"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Happiness -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Happiness"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Emotion"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#HavingMeal -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;HavingMeal"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;HighLevelContext"/> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Eating"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:someValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Home"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Restaurant"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:someValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Eating"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Home"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Restaurant"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> <owl:Class> <owl:intersectionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Sitting"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Restaurant"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Sitting"/> </owl:Restriction> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Restaurant"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasEmotion"/> <owl:allValuesFrom> <owl:Class> <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection"> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Disgust"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Happiness"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Neutral"/> <rdf:Description rdf:about="&icl2;Surprise"/> </owl:unionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:allValuesFrom> </owl:Restriction> </owl:intersectionOf> </owl:Class> </owl:equivalentClass> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#HighLevelContext -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;HighLevelContext"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Context"/> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasActivity"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Activity"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasEmotion"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Emotion"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&icl2;hasLocation"/> <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&icl2;Location"/> </owl:Restriction> </rdfs:subClassOf> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="&icl2;LowLevelContext"/> <rdfs:comment>Class to describe the high level contexts</rdfs:comment> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Hiking -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Hiking"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Activity"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#Home -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="&icl2;Home"> <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&icl2;Location"/> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.miningminds.re.kr/icl/context/context-v2.owl#HouseWork -->
